description.en:
Jung HyeonWoo had neither ‘Talent’, ‘Money’, or ‘Luck’.

“Why can I see the hidden information in the game?”

After an electrocution accident, I started being able to see stuff I couldn’t before in the game.

---
- **"BJ"** is a Korean slang that means **Streamer**.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7M4wH6g1eI)
description.ko:
'재능'도, '돈'도, '운'도 없던 정현우.

"게임의 히든 정보들이 왜 보이는 거지?"

감전 사고에 당하고부터 게임 속 보이지 않아야 하는 것들이 보이기 시작했다.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7M4wH6g1eI)

description.en:
Following a momentous battle against giants for the fate of the world, Ronan emerges victorious as the last man standing of the Imperial Army. As he laments this hollow victory with his dying commander, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they quickly learn that the war is far from over and an overwhelming force of giants descends from the heavens.

Fearing the worst, yet seeing hope in the courageous Ronan, Adeshan uses her last time slip to send him back to the past, so that he can enroll in the prestigious Phileon Academy and become the strongest swordsman the empire has ever seen!

altTitles.en: It's Hard to Pick up Reptile Girls

altTitles.ja: 爬虫類ちゃんは懐かない

description.en: Rui Hanaka is a herpetologist who loves reptiles, and is always studying them. But one day, when his beloved leopard gecko Nancy shed her skin, she became super cute…?!
description.pt: Rui Hanaka é um herpetologista que ama répteis e sempre os estuda. Mas um dia, quando sua amada lagartixa-leopardo, Nancy, trocou de pele, ela ficou super fofa…?!

altTitles.ja: アリスさんちの囲炉裏端

altTitles.th: มื้ออุ่นหน้าเตาแห่งบ้านคุณอลิซ

altTitles.en: By The Hearth At Alice-san's Home
By the Furnace of Miss Alice’s House

description.en:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.
description.pt-br: Depois de 10 anos, Alice volta de Tóquio para a sua cidade natal e mora sozinha em uma antiga casa tradicional Japonesa com lareira. Harumi, um amigo de infância, estava animado para se encontrar novamente depois de muito tempo, mas o calor da lareira com Alice continua tão quente quanto no passado...

title.en: Kuroko no Basket - Akashi Ayakashi Kiseki Kitan (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: 黒子のバスケ - あかしあやかし輝石奇譚 (Doujinshi)

description.en: Pairing: Akashi Seijuurou x Kuroko Tetsuya

altTitles.ja: ムサシノ輪舞曲 (ロンド)

description.en: Musashibara Tamaki (35), a sharp-tongued woman who is firm in how she lives her life, had been living by herself until her younger brother, Bunta, came back to their family home after a breakup. Her old student and next-door neighbor, Agawa Ryuuhei (25), has had an unrequited crush on Tamaki for a long time now. After being rejected twice by her, how does he deal with his feelings? A mature story of unrequited love with an ensemble cast that unfolds in an elegant and laid-back town.

A young boy from the Korou wolf-clan, Itomaki, suddenly enters his “hunger period.” In order to end it, he must raise a fairy-like creature known as an “Amegashi,” and 1 year later – eat her. For an Amegashi, their only source of food is the blood of a Korou. To eat, and be eaten – together in this ancient coexistence, the two begin their relationship. This heart-wrenching fantasy paints the story of a love so pure, it transcends the boundaries between different races.

The story takes place in a village in the 19th century. It begins when a group of hunters have just hunted a wild boar and see a monkey staring at them. A hunter threw stones at a monkey to chase it away. That night, the monkey and his friends went into the village and started attacking the people by imitating the human actions he saw, like stoning, butchering, abcxyz, etc.
description.es-la: Tercer año de la era Temmei. En medio de la escasez de alimentos provocada por la hambruna, el pueblo de montaña donde vive el protagonista Kaei consigue ganarse la vida algo mejor que los demás cazando animales salvajes. Un día, sin embargo, llega a la aldea un hombre que afirma haberse perdido en las montañas. El hombre se niega a mirar a Kaei a los ojos, pero él y su familia le reciben con los brazos abiertos. Esa noche, en las afueras de la aldea, entran más bestias no invitadas...

description.en: A sequel to the successful baseball manga MAJOR by the same author. The series follows Gorou's son Daigo.

“Dawn” entered the hall with her calm movements and stood in the middle. Her face showed no emotions, like a doll, but she was captivating and elegant, strikingly like an ice queen. Exer smiled lightly, spread her legs, and said, ‘As Lord, I will embrace you tonight.’ A fateful encounter for the first time. A woman falls in love at first sight. And a man fights the world for this woman. ‘If this world cannot accept her as a wife, then I will change this world.’ A love story between Dawn, the Eastern girl who endured a tough childhood while fleeing from war and became a slave, and Exer, the handsome man who was known as the strongest warrior in the kingdom.

altTitles.ja: 百木田家の古書暮らし

altTitles.en: Living in an Antiquarian Bookstore of the Karakida Family

description.en:
The world's largest collection of used bookstores, Kanda-Jinbōchō. There begins the story of the unforgettable days the three Karakida sisters spend surrounded by the scent of used books when they inherit the used bookstore their grandfather left behind.
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/gj_karakida)
description.es: Kanda Jinbouchou, el barrio de librerías de segunda mano más famoso del mundo. Las tres hermanas Karakida se trasladaron a la ciudad para cuidar la herencia de su abuelo. Rodeadas del aroma de los libros usados, las tres hermanas hilvanan su día a día.
description.ja: 世界一の古書店街・神田神保町。祖父の遺した古本屋を引き継ぐため、その街で暮らすことになった百木田（からきだ）三姉妹。古本の香りに包まれながら三姉妹は色褪せない日常を紡いでいく――。

title.en: Wandering Witch: The Journey of Elaina

description.en:
Once upon a time, there was a witch named Elaina, who set off on a journey across the world. Along the way, she would meet all kinds of people, from a country full of witches to a giant in love with his own muscles—but with each meeting, Elaina would become a small part of their story, and her own world would get a little bit bigger.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Akasha as **The Journey of Elaina** (2022)
description.id: Melakukan perjalanan tanpa henti, bertemu berbagai macam orang dari berbagai macam negara, serta mengembara demi memenuhi rasa ingin tahu. Inilah kisah pertemuan dan perpisahan penyihir kelabu Elaina.
description.ja: あるところに一人の魔女がいました。名前はイレイナ。彼女は旅人として、これといった目的もなく、色々な国や人と出逢いながら、流されるように気ままな長い旅を続けています。これは、そんな魔女イレイナが紡ぐ、出逢いと別れの物語…。
description.ru: Много лет странствующая ведьма Элейна находится в пути. Неустанно она путешествует по миру, чтобы повидать разные страны, удивительные обычаи и разносторонние проявления человеческой натуры. Сколько историй она может рассказать как их живой свидетель. Давайте же и мы поспешим составить ей компанию!

altTitles.ja: 嫌がってるキミが好き

altTitles.en: I Like You With That Look of Repulsion

description.en:
It finally happened, Shirakawa Mikoto was confessed to for the first time in her life! Otsuki Makoto wasn’t exactly her ideal man but, she wanted to have a boyfriend to show off to her friends. It turns out dating someone you don’t even know can be complicated, especially if they are a bit strange.  
This is a raunchy, heart pounding love story. Expect goosebumps and some doki doki action on the side.

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

altTitles.zh-ro: Xing Meng Ou Xiang Ji Hua

description.en: The shining lights, the magnificent stage! Friendships created through singing, making a future through dancing, the girls embark on their journey towards their dreams! One who has lost status due to a scandal is hiding a plot behind her back. A pair of bosom friends, separated by fate. A girl who tries to exonerate her mother sets off on her journey for a talent competition. When the stage turns into an empty battlefield, she uses her voice to chase after her dreams.

May 2003. An icy planet from distant space crashes into Venus, changing its qualities completely. These qualities prove to present some habitability for humans, enticing men to eventually colonize it for themselves...

80 years later, Venus is home to many people who call it home. However, an ever-present tension between the two major continents, Aphrodia and Ishtar, points to an ominous fate for Venus.

Hiroki Senoo is a rather rebellious member of a motorsport popular within Aphrodia's capital. One day, members of Aphrodia's military approach Hiroki, and, impressed by his skills, invite him to join. Thus, Hiroki finds himself enveloped in Venus's political landscape...

title.en: Capcom vs SNK: The King of Fighters vs Street Fighters

altTitles.ja: ベイブレードエックス

description.en: Beyblade pros from around the world gather to compete in the Pro League held inside the X Tower!

title.en: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago

altTitles.zh: 我家老婆来自一千年前

altTitles.zh-ro: Wojia Laopo Laizi Yiqian Nian Qian
Wǒjiā Lǎopó Láizì Yīqiān Nián Qián

altTitles.vi: Vợ Tôi Từ Một Ngàn Năm Trước
Bà Xã Nhà Tôi Đến Từ Ngàn Năm Trước

altTitles.fr: Ma femme vient d'il y a 1000 ans

description.en: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.

title.en: Otaku ni Otoku na Gal Gurashi

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Otoku na Gal Gurashi

altTitles.ja: オタクにオトクなギャルぐらし

altTitles.ja-ro: Otaku ni Otoku na Gyaru Gurashi

altTitles.en: An Otaku and an Otaku Gyaru's Life Together
Otaku and Gyaru Living Together With Benefits
A Gal’s Guide To Budget Living for an Otaku

description.en: Yutaka Kongouji is the son of a wealthy family, but also an introvert and an otaku. He lives only to spend all his allowance supporting his favorite idol. But when his parents' business fails, he has to move into a run-down apartment on his own. There he ran into Rino Hyuga, a popular gal in his class...

There exists a limbo realm where the cost of admission is death! Here a new battlefield is populated by the most powerful and fearsome martial artists the world has ever known. Time holds little importance as fighters from many eras and periods of history share the same timeline. From the hit video game series SNK vs. Capcom comes an exciting martial arts event. Capcom's most popular fighting game characters face off against SNK's legendary masters. All your favorite characters are here: Vega, Mai Shiranui, Dimitri - the Vampire, Chun Li, Guile, Akuma, the mysterious Mr. Karate, and others have all gathered for reasons yet to be revealed. Witness explosive battles between Ryu and Kyo Kusanagi, Terry Bogard vs. M. Bison, Iori vs. Balrog and many more seemingly unlikely match-ups. Some fight for glory, some for survival, while others keep secret a more sinister purpose.

altTitles.en: My Little Sister Is a Cat

description.en: The daily life of a young man, whose little sister is a cat.

altTitles.es: Arcadia de la luz de la luna

description.en: Rashil lives with his grandpa in a mountain area. On a trip in the woods he sees an airship crash and finds a girl. She's been followed by soldiers, which want to capture her.

Koyomi Araragi, a third-year high school student, manages to survive a vampire attack with the help of Meme Oshino, a strange man residing in an abandoned building. Though being saved from vampirism and now a human again, several side effects such as superhuman healing abilities and enhanced vision still remain. Regardless, Araragi tries to live the life of a normal student, with the help of his friend and the class president, Tsubasa Hanekawa. When fellow classmate Hitagi Senjougahara falls down the stairs and is caught by Araragi, the boy realizes that the girl is unnaturally weightless. Despite Senjougahara's protests, Araragi insists he help her, deciding to enlist the aid of Oshino, the very man who had once helped him with his own predicament. Through several tales involving demons and gods, Bakemonogatari follows Araragi as he attempts to help those who suffer from supernatural maladies.

[INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/2219-bakemonogatari?utm_source=mgd)
description.ru: Арараги Коёми — с виду самый обычный школьник — однажды поднимался по лестнице. Неожиданно на него сверху падает его одноклассница, Хитаги Сэндзёгахара — молчаливая и нелюдимая. Уже было подставив руки, паренек приготовился упасть вместе с девушкой, но та оказалась не тяжелее школьного учебника… Через какое-то время Коёми понял: несмотря на образ, который сложился за долгое время, Сэндзёгахара молчит совсем не из-за скромности! Больно крутой и дерзкий характер у нее оказался. А ещё она легко и быстро достает буквально из воздуха острые предметы — школьные канцтовары. Но и сам Арараги оказался не слишком прост. Он рассказал, что сам до недавнего времени был вампиром, и выручил его один знакомый — Мэмэ Ошино. Не поймешь, святой или просто старый хиппи… Он объяснил: над Хитаги кто-то подшутил. И этот кто-то — бог. Ну, а что делать обычному герою? Помогать девушкам в беде, конечно же! А их таких о-очень много…
description.pt-br: Koyomi Araragi, um estudante do terceiro ano, que é quase humano novamente depois de se tornar por um breve período um vampiro. Um dia, uma colega de classe chamada Hitagi Senjogahara, que vergonhosamente nunca fala com ninguém, cai da escada nos braços de Koyomi. Ele descobre que Hitagi não possui peso nenhum, um desafio a física. Apesar de ter sido ameaçado por ela, Koyomi oferece sua ajuda, e apresenta a Meme Oshino, um homem sem-teto de meia-idade que o ajudou a deixar de ser um vampiro.

description.en: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

title.en: Tune In to the Midnight Heart

altTitles.ja: 真夜中ハートチューン

altTitles.en: Finding the girl behind the voice.

altTitles.pt-br: Sintonizando com o Coração da Meia Noite
Em busca da garota por trás da voz

description.en:
***"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."***

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people? A cute yet hard-working success romantic comedy begins here!!

---
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
description.ja:
***「深夜ひとり、ベッドの上、キミの声だけが救いだった。もう一度キミと話したい。言いたいことがあるんだ」。***

高校2年生の山吹有栖は、「アポロ」という名の、顔も本名も知らないラジオ配信者の少女を探していた。だがある日、有栖は進学先の高校の放送部にアポロの手がかりを得る。そこにいたのは「声に関わる仕事に就く」夢を描く美少女が…4人!!アポロは誰？4人の夢の行方は？かわいくも懸命なサクセスラブコメ、ここに開演!!
description.pt-br: Yamabuki Arisu, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, estava procurando por uma garota chamada “Apollo”, que era locutora de rádio e ele não conhecia seu rosto ou seu nome verdadeiro. No entanto, um dia, Arisu recebe uma pista sobre Apollo do clube de transmissão da escola secundária para a qual ela estava indo. Havia quatro belas garotas que sonhavam em “conseguir um emprego relacionado à voz”!! Quem é Apollo? O que acontecerá com os sonhos dessas quatro pessoas? Uma comédia romântica fofa, mas trabalhadora e de sucesso, começa aqui!!

altTitles.ja: 終の退魔師―エンダーガイスター

altTitles.th: มือปราบปิศาจคนสุดท้าย ENDER GEISTER

altTitles.vi: Chung Chi Thối Ma Sư -Ender Geister-

description.en:
Akira, a demonically strong S-class exorcist, is sent from Germany to investigate a paranormal event in a certain city in Japan. 
He destroys creatures from other worlds with his beautiful exorcist partner Chikage.
description.es: Akira es un exorcista de clase S que es enviado desde Alemania para investigar un incidente sobrenatural en cierta ciudad de Japón. Él y su compañera, la hermoso exorcista Chikage, acabarán a las criaturas que han venido de otro mundo.
description.id: Akira adalah pengusir setan kelas S yang dikirim dari Jerman untuk menyelidiki insiden supernatural di kota tertentu di Jepang. Dia dan rekannya, pengusir setan cantik Chikage, akan menghabisi makhluk yang datang dari dunia lain.

altTitles.th: 【เกิดใหม่เป็นลูกโอชิ】

altTitles.pt-br: Oshi no Ko - Minha Estrela Preferida

description.el:
H Άι Χόσινο είναι ένα ανερχώμενο μουσικό είδωλο, η οποία ανακοίνωσε ξαφνικά οτι θα πάρει ενα διάλειμμα από το μουσικό της γκρουπ, Μπι-Κομάτσι, για λόγους υγείας. Προς εκπλήξη ενός από τους μεγαλύτερους θαυμάστες της, του γυναικολόγου Γκόρο Αμεμίγια, μια μέρα η νεαρή Αϊ εμφανίστηκε στο νοσοκομείο οπού δουλεύει. Ο Γκόρο έρχοντας πλεον πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο με την αδυναμία του, τρέμει στο γεγονός ότι η 16-χρονη Αϊ είναι έγκυος... με δίδυμα με τον πατέρα άφαντο. Αποφασισμένη να αποκτήσει την δικιά της οικογένεια και να συνεχίσει την δουλεία της ως είδωλο, έχει σκοπο να κρατήσει την γέννα των παιδιών της μυστικο, μαζί με την βοήθεια του Γκόρο.

Το δυνατότερο όπλο ενός ειδώλου ειναι τα ψέματα.
Μια ίστορια μυστηρίου και εξαπάτησης, όπου η σκοτεινή πλευρά της σόου-μπιζ αποκαλύπτεται κάτω από τις στρώσεις ψεμάτων και εκμεταλεύσεων.
description.en:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
description.es:
'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.

- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.fa: آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه.
description.fr:
L'histoire commence avec une belle fille, son sourire parfaitement faux, et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?  


---

- [Nominated for the 14th annual Manga Taisho awards.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-24/14th-manga-taisho-awards-nominate-10-titles/.168759)

- [Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_ko)
description.ja: 「この芸能界（せかい）において嘘は武器だ」　地方都市で、産婦人科医として働くゴロー。芸能界とは無縁の日々。一方、彼の“推し”のアイドル・星野アイは、スターダムを上り始めていた。そんな二人が“最悪”の出会いを果たし、運命が動き出す…!?
description.ru:
Что, если бы дорога в шоу-бизнес была открыта для тебя с самого начала?  
Новая серия оригинальной манги от двух известных авторов — Акасака Ака («Госпожа Кагуя: в любви как на войне») и Ёкояри Мэнго («Тайные желания отвергнутых»). Это совершенно новая работа, в которой мир шоу-бизнеса предстаёт перед читателями в очень необычном свете: у лидера идол-группы Хосино Аи есть секрет, о котором никто не должен знать…  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.vi:
Câu chuyện khởi đầu với sự xuất hiện của một cô gái xinh đẹp, mang nụ cười giả tạo hoàn hảo, và có những người yêu cô ấy một cách ích kỷ bất chấp điều đó.

Điều gì diễn ra đằng sau ánh hào quang của thế giới showbiz? Con người ta sẽ làm đến mức nào vì thần tượng yêu quý của mình? Bạn sẽ làm gì nếu phát hiện ra luân hồi chuyển kiếp là có thật? Nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Aquamarine Hoshino liệu có hoàn thành được khát vọng báo thù trước khi bị thế giới hào nhoáng ấy nuốt trọn? Hãy cùng đón xem bộ truyện được sáng tác bởi bộ đôi tác giả của Kaguya-sama và Kuzu no Honkai.
description.es-la:
La historia comienza con una hermosa chica, su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.
  
¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino, y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?
description.pt-br: Doutor Goro é obstetra em um hospital do interior e se encontra longe do mundo em que brilha e evolui Aï Hoshino, uma cantora de sucesso crescente da qual é fã absoluto. O que ele ainda não sabe é que sem mais nem menos ele se encontrará com sua idol favorita em uma circunstância um pouco fora do normal. Terá ele tempo suficiente para ficar perto dela ou o mundo irá girar de maneira cruel para ele? Essa é uma história sobre o mundo do entretenimento japonês.

altTitles.en: The Mob Boss’s Daughter and Her Caretaker

altTitles.vi: Con Gái Ông Trùm Băng Đảng và Người Trông Trẻ

altTitles.pt-br: O guia da Yakuza para babás

description.en:
Kirishima Tooru is the right-hand man of the Sakuragi crime family. For him, the job is a perfect excuse to let his violent instincts run wild, earning him the nickname “the Demon of Sakuragi”. It seems like nothing will stand in the way of his vicious nature.

But then one day, he receives an assignment like never before from the boss—babysitting his daughter!

This is the heartwarming (or is it bloodcurdling?) story of a little girl and her yakuza caretaker!
description.pt-br: Kirishima Tooru, 28 anos, wakagashira do Grupo Sakuragi. Felizmente gosta de fazer o que bem entender, porque é o mundo do crime organizado, ele ganhou o título "O Demônio do Grupo Sakuragi". Então um dia, ele acabou encarregado da filha única do chefe?!

altTitles.es: MI VIDA SEXUAL: y otros relatos eróticos

description.en:
Seinen One-shot compilation containing 15 one-shots, published between 1968 and 1976, with an emphasis on themes of eroticism and SF.

Chiefly contains works published in Gekiga magazines.

title.en: Unaware His Majesty Is a Girl

altTitles.vi: Hoàng đế bệ hạ là nữ lang

altTitles.my: ဘုရင်ကြီးကမိန်းကလေးမှန်းမသိခဲ့ဘူး

altTitles.vi: Không Ngờ Bệ Hạ Là Nữ

description.en:
The new emperor, Qi Nian, acceded to the throne many years ago. He kept refusing the requests by his officials to choose a consort, brushing them off by saying "the affairs of state are important, and I am busy with my work". But Qi Nian finally relented as rumors that "the emperor is impotent" spread ever more widely.

Yu Dingdang was a particularly dim-witted girl, but born to a prestigious family. This led many to say: "Madame Yu exchanged her brain for her looks". Who could have expected that Yu would be selected by the emperor to be his empress consort?

A happy and dramatic girl-girl romantic comedy set in the imperial palace. Yu couldn't have expected that this lofty emperor up on high was actually a girl?!
description.zh: 新帝祁念登基多年，却终日以“国事要紧，朕沉迷工作”，拒绝了朝臣们的选妃请求。但“皇帝不行”的流言愈演愈烈，祁念不胜其烦，终是松口。玉玎珰出身名门，却生了个榆木脑袋，众人纷纷道：“玉家小姐是拿脑子换的脸”却不想，一朝入选，她竟成了国母。玉玎珰表面：啊？什么？是我吗？内心却汹涌澎湃。只因玉玎珰从小便立誓，一！定！要！成！为！祁！念！的！女！人！迷妹追星成功，在皇宫里上演了一系列“她逃她追，她插翅难飞”的啼笑皆非的欢喜故事却不想，这高高在上的至尊帝王，竟是女儿身？！
description.zh-hk: 新帝祁念登基多年，卻終日以“國事要緊，朕沉迷工作”，拒絕了朝臣們的選妃請求。 但「皇帝不行」的流言愈演愈烈，祁念不勝其煩，終是鬆口。 玉玎璫出身名門，卻生了個榆木腦袋，眾人紛紛道：「玉家小姐是拿腦子換的臉」卻不想，一朝入選，她竟成了國母。 玉玎璫表面：啊？ 什麼？ 是我嗎？ 內心卻洶湧澎湃。 只因玉玎璫從小便立誓，一！ 定！ 要！ 成！ 為！ 祁！ 念！ 的！ 女！ 人！ 迷妹追星成功，在皇宮裡上演了一系列「她逃她追，她插翅難飛」的啼笑皆非的歡喜故事卻不想，這高高在上的至尊帝王，竟是女兒身？ ！

altTitles.ja: 九龍ジェネリックロマンス

description.en:
The greatest labyrinth of the 20th century, a drama for working men and women in a town called Kowloon Walled City. A daily adult romance in a gentle dystopia.  
  
(…can a dystopia be gentle?)
description.ja: 此処は東洋の魔窟、九龍城砦。ノスタルジー溢れる人々が暮らし、街並みに過去・現在・未来が交差するディストピア。はたらく30代の男女の非日常で贈る日常と密かな想いと関係性をあざやかに描き出す理想的なラヴロマンスを貴方に――。
description.pt-br: O maior labirinto do século 20, um drama para homens e mulheres trabalhadores de uma cidade murada chamada Kowloon. Um romance adulto diário em uma distopia suave, uma nova vida tranquila.

description.en:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill “Porter,” which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party “Black Lion of Foresight.” One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk’s skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio — and then?

title.en: Oshi to no Yuri wa Arienai!

altTitles.ja: 完璧な委員長ちゃんと合法ギャルちゃんの漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Kanpeki na Iinchou-chan to Gouhou Gal-chan no Manga

altTitles.en: There's No Way I Could Date My Fave!

altTitles.ja: 推しとの百合はありえない！

altTitles.ja-ro: Oshi to no Yuri wa Arienai!

description.en: The perfectionist class president, Tsukamoto Anne, has one small problem: a gyaru in her class, Kenzaki Kaoru, is so exceptionally dumb that she's in danger of repeating the year! However, Kenzaki Kaoru has one small problem of her own: the class president, Tsukamoto Anne, is exacly the kind of person she worships as a god-like fave! The serious class president wants her reign to be perfect, while the creepy otaku gyaru wants to hide her true nature—and so, a battle between the two begins!

In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

altTitles.vi: Rockman - Chiến binh thế giới ảo

description.en: The year is 200X, an age where everything is covered with computer networks, and everyone in the world has a "PET" mobile terminal. Hikari Netto, a grade school student at Akihara Elementary, is in perfect harmony with his NetNavi, Rockman, and is obsessed with Net Battles. But then, he gets caught up in an incident involving World Three (WWW), a criminal organization that stages cyber-terrorist attacks. Finally, the Ministry of Science is taken over, and Netto's father is taken hostage. In order to save his father and stop WWW's plan, he confronts the Dream Virus, the most powerful computer virus fused with the "Ultimate Program."

title.en: Sekai Saikyou no Majo, Hajimemashita ~Watashi Dake "Kouryaku Saito" o Miseru Sekai de Jiyuu ni Ikimasu~

altTitles.ja: 世界最強の魔女、始めました ～私だけ『攻略サイト』を見れる世界で自由に生きます～

altTitles.en: I Became the World's Strongest Witch: I Will Live Freely in a World Where Only I can Access the "Guide Site"
The World's Strongest Witch Has Begun - I Will Live Freely In A World Where Only I Can View The "Strategy Site" -

description.en:
An unknown skill turns into unlimited power with divine knowledge [Internet]!

"To manifest an SSS rank with the weakest skill is a disgrace!"

Rona is a girl who was expelled from her home due to her lack of money, food, and power. Lost and hopeless, she suddenly hears the words...

"Would you like some guidance?"

She discovers how to utilize her unique SSS rank skill: [Internet], which she alone possesses. The true nature of this skill is the ability to access this world's 'guide sites' - an extraordinary cheat skill! Endless production of valuable items! Acquiring ultra-rare equipment! Thanks to her skill, she can do as she pleases...!
description.ja:
「…攻略うぃき？」――最弱クラスのスキルを発現してしまい追放された少女・ローナ。しかしそのスキルの正体は、この世界の『攻略サイト』を見ることができるＳＳＳランクのチートスキル【インターネット】だった！

（１）冒険開始→（２）即・最強武器発見→（３）世界を混乱に陥れる最強少女に‥‥‥。ローナは言う。「私はただ、平和に自由に生きたいだけなのにいぃ‥‥‥！」

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

In the spring of my third year of middle school, I found Shibata buried beneath a sakura tree. We watched movies and became fast friends, even planned to make a movie together for the school festival...but no one at school seemed to know him. I will discover Shibata and the whole world will turn into Shibata. This is a story of, by, and for Shibata. Now showing in a theater near you.

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢転生おじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Reincarnated as a Villainess

description.en: After a traffic accident, 52-year-old civil servant Kenzaburou Tondabayashi awakens to find he's become Grace Auvergne, a duke's daughter, and more importantly the villainess of an otome game. Not wanting to get in the way of the happy endings of the young characters around him, Grace sets out to play the role of the villain, but whether it's due to Kenzaburou's memories of being an affectionate parent getting in the way or not being able to remember those pesky foreign names properly, it ends up being a lot harder than it looks…
description.id:
Setelah mengalami sebuah kecelakaan, seorang PNS berusia 52 tahun bernama kenzaburou tondabayashi tiba-tiba berada di tubuh seorang putri duke yang bernama grace auvergne, terlebih lagi, grace merupakan seorang villainess di sebuah game otome. Tidak ingin mengganggu happy ending anak-anak muda yang ada di dekatnya, grace memutuskan untuk menjalankan perannya sebagai seorang villainess, tapi mungkin karena ingatan kenzaburou yang dulunya merupakan seorang orang tua yang penuh kasih sayang atau karena tidak bisa mengingat nama-nama asing, akhirnya setiap grace ingin menjalankan peran villainessnya, grace selalu terganggu.
Sehingga dia merasa menjadi seorang villainess ternyata lebih sulit dari yang dia pikirkan...

title.en: Musuko ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku no Hahaoya

altTitles.en: Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!

altTitles.es-la: La madre demonio indefensa frente a la lindura de su hijo

altTitles.zh: 儿子可爱过头的魔族母亲

altTitles.ja: 息子がかわいくて仕方がない魔族の母親

altTitles.ko: 아들이 귀여워서 어쩔 수 없는 마족엄마

altTitles.tr: Oğlunun Tatlılığına Karşı Koyamayan Bir Şeytan Anne

description.en:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!
description.tr: Bir iblisin kötü günlerini arkada bırakarak, anne olma yolundaki adımlarını anlatan sevimli bir seri.

description.en:
Ciel avoided her brother's obsession and entered into a contract marriage. She was betrayed by her fiance who fell in love with someone else, so she decides to start a new life somewhere else. By chance, Ciel meets her neighbor Otestad, who saves her life, and ends up discovering that he is actually the prince who was fleeing a threat.

A romance about two people who want to fight against destiny and free themselves. Will Ciel be able to fulfill the wish of not having a life stolen again?
description.pt-br: Ciella celebrou um casamento por contrato para evitar a obsessão de seu irmão adotivo. Porém, quando seu noivo, em quem ela pensava poder confiar, a trai porque ela está cega pelo amor, ela monta um novo lar para encontrar sua própria vida legítima. “Você gostaria de pegar aquela maçã?” Enquanto isso, Ciella, que deve sua vida a Otestad, um vizinho que conhece por acaso, percebe que ele é na verdade um príncipe que evitava uma ameaça. Um romance entre duas pessoas que querem escapar do seu destino e lutar contra ele. Será que Ciella conseguirá cumprir sua promessa de não permitir mais que sua vida lhe seja tirada?

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

description.en: A terrible virus has appeared in Seoul! On the same day Lee Yeongwoo and his classmates are traveling there. They are trapped in the tense atmosphere of Seoul, with the virus in the form of bubbles like frog eggs!
description.pt-br: Yeon Woo está apaixonado. Ele não tem olhos pra mais nada além da So Yeon. Na escola ele não conseguiu falar com ela, mas agora que eles estão indo pra uma excursão escolar em Seoul, ele tem esperança de conseguir pelo menos começar a conversar com ela, mesmo apesar de ser muito introvertido. Porém, tem coisas estranhas acontecendo em Seoul… Algo terrível está prestes a dominar a cidade… Nesse dia, Seoul de repente é…?

title.en: Even Though I'm a Lesbian a Boy in the Neighborhood Asked Me to Marry Him. But Ten Years Later...

altTitles.ja: 女が好きなのに近所の男の子に求婚された。その10年後・・・

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna ga Suki Nano ni Kinjo Otokonoko ni Kyuukon sareta. Sono Juunengo...
Onna ga Suki Nano ni Kinjo Otokonoko ni Kyuukon sareta. Sono 10-nengo...

altTitles.ja: 今日から始める幼なじみ

altTitles.en: Starting Today She's My Childhood Friend

description.en:
Kaede Yuzuki is Kouhei Aida's new neighbor, both at home and in the classroom. Kouhei tries to be friendly with Kaede, but their conversations lead nowhere. But then one day…
___
[Official X Account](https://twitter.com/kyo_osa0420)

In a town with nothing, in the middle of a daily life with seemingly no signs of change, 
high schooler Reiji Kurose was "just" living. 
Family, dreams for the future, childhood friends were all binding him down to that city. 
He thought he would "just" keep on living like that. Until he met her. 
Is there hope in living? Is there light waiting ahead? 
It's the start of a boy meets girl series which reflects the "now."
description.fr:
Dans une ville vide, au milieu d'une vie quotidienne répétitive, Reiji Kurose, lycéen, ne faisait que " vivre". 
Sa famille, ses rêves d'avenir, ses amis d'enfance. Tous ces éléments le liaient à cette ville. 
Il pensait qu'il continuerait "juste" à vivre jusqu'à la fin, jusqu'à ce qu'il la rencontre. 
Y a-t-il de l'espoir dans la vie ? Y a-t-il de la lumière dans l'avenir ? 
C'est le début d'une série de rencontres entre garçons et filles qui reflète le présent!
description.ru: В пустом городке, в разгаре своей повседневной жизни, казалось бы, "просто" жил старшеклассник Рэйдзи Куросе. Семья, мечты о будущем, друзья детства - все это привязывало его к своему родному городу. Он думал, что будет продолжать так жить и никогда ничего не изменит. Пока он не встретил ту самую. Есть ли надежда в жизни? Есть ли впереди свет? Это начало серии "мальчик, повстречавший девочку", которая отражает "сейчас".
description.tr: Reiji Kurose, hiçbir şeyin olmadığı ve görünüşe bakılırsa hiçbir değişimin de olmayacağı bir kasabada ot gibi yaşıyordu. Ailesi, gelecek hayalleri ve çocukluk arkadaşları... Hepsi onu o şehre zincirliyordu. Kendince böyle yaşar giderim diyordu. Taa ki onunla tanışıncaya dek. Yaşamanın bir manası var mı? Beni bekleyen bir gelecek var mı? Oğlan ve kızın tanışmasıyla trajedi kapıları aralanır...
description.vi: Một bộ truyện đầy u ám cùng tác giả với Hatsukoi Zombie. Trong một thị trấn nhàm chán và ngày qua ngày không có gì thay đổi, Reiji Kurose, một học sinh trung học vốn luôn "sống" như "đã chết". Gia đình, tương lai, bạn thời thơ ấu. Tất cả đều trói buộc cậu vào thị trấn này. Cậu luôn nghĩ bản thân đã "chết" cho đến khi gặp được cô gái ấy. Hy vọng nào thắp sáng cho cuộc đời tăm tối của hai người? câu chuyện về hành trình tìm đến "cái chết" để được "sống" chính thức bắt đầu.

altTitles.th: BLUE LOCK ขังดวลแข้ง

description.de: Nach dem Aus im Achtelfinale bei der WM 2018 ruft der japanische Fußballverband ein Projekt ins Leben, das den ultimativen Stürmer erschaffen und Japan den Weltmeistertitel bringen soll: Blue Lock. Zu diesem Zweck werden die 300 talentiertesten Oberschüler versammelt, darunter auch Yoichi Isagi, ein unbeschriebenes Blatt. Kann er sich gegen die große Konkurrenz durchsetzen und Japans große Hoffnung werden?
description.en:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
description.fr:
Isagi Yoichi a perdu l'opportunité d'aller aux championnats nationaux des lycées parce qu'il a passé la balle à son coéquipier qui a raté son but. Isagi est l'un des 300 attaquants U-18 choisis par Ego Jinpachi, un homme qui a été embauché par la Fédération Japonaise de Football après la Coupe du Monde de la FIFA 2018, pour guider le Japon vers la victoire de la Coupe du Monde en détruisant le football japonais. Le plan d'Ego est d'isoler les 300 attaquants dans une institution semblable à une prison appelée "Blue Lock", afin de créer le plus grand "égoïste"/attaquant du monde, ce qui fait défaut dans le football japonais.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Pika**
description.pl:
Piłkarskie battle royale – tak można opisać całą tę historię.  
Z powodu niepowodzeń na mistrzostwach świata, Japoński Związek Piłki Nożnej postanawia wdrożyć program, dzięki któremu uda się stworzyć rewolucyjnego napastnika.  
Yoichi Isagi otrzymuje zaproszenie do wzięcia udziału w tym właśnie programie. Zamknięty w placówce o nazwie Blue Lock, będzie walczył z 299 innymi graczami i starał się zostać najlepszym napastnikiem na świecie.
description.vi: Blue Lock (ブルーロック Burū Rokku) hay Dự án bồi dưỡng cầu thủ đặc biệt là một dự án chuyên đào tạo những tiền đạo trẻ từ khắp nơi trên đất nước Nhật Bản, bao gồm 3 vòng tuyển chọn chính và các vòng phụ. Dự án này có sự tham gia của 300 tiền đạo trẻ và họ sẽ đối đầu trực tiếp với nhau trong các vòng đấu loại trực tiếp.
description.pt-br: Yoichi Isagi perdeu a oportunidade de ir para o campeonato nacional do ensino médio porque ele passou para seu companheiro de equipe que perdeu em vez de chutar para o gol si mesmo. Isagi é um dos 300 atacantes de Sub-18 escolhidos por Jinpachi Ego, contratado pela Associação de Futebol do Japão após a Copa do Mundo de 2018, para guiar o Japão na conquista da Copa do Mundo ao destruir o futebol japonês. O plano de Ego é isolar os 300 atacantes em uma instituição parecida com uma prisão chamada “Blue Lock”, para criar o maior “egoista” / atacante do mundo, que tem faltado no futebol japonês.

title.en: Genshiken Nidaime - The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture II

altTitles.ja: げんしけん 二代目

description.en:
Genshiken follows the lives of a group of college students drawn together by their shared hobbies, and the trials and adventures associated with being otaku.  
  
Genshiken Nidaime ("Second Generation") is a continuation of the previous series, with chapter numbering starting at 56.
